name: Marbella Rallye
description:
Marbelle Rallye by gen_raw

This is a little car racing game you can play against the time or with a friend in splitscreen. 

Up to now only Keyboard controll is supported. 

This is my first attempt building a game.  Most of the game mechanics and inspiration by Imphenzia. He is a great youtuber and developer, his tutorial series "Low Poly Racer" made this game possible and I can't stop to be thankful for his share of knowledge. 

Since this is my first game I would be really happy about feedback. Thanks a lot for testing and playing! Have fun!
